1: %%%===================================================================
    2: %%% @copyright (C) 2011, Erlang Solutions Ltd.
    3: %%% @doc Suite for testing mod_offline* modules
    4: %%% @end
    5: %%%===================================================================
    6: 
    7: -module(offline_SUITE).
    8: -compile(export_all).
    9: 
   10: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   11: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   12: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   13: 
   14: -define(MAX_OFFLINE_MSGS, 5).
   15: 
   16: %%%===================================================================
   17: %%% Suite configuration
   18: %%%===================================================================
   19: 
   20: all() ->
   21:     [{group, mod_offline_tests}].
   22: 
   23: all_tests() ->
   24:     [simple_message,
   25:      error_message,
   26:      groupchat_message,
   27:      headline_message,
   28:      max_offline_messages_reached,
   29:      message_expiry].
   30: 
   31: groups() ->
   32:     [{mod_offline_tests, [sequence], all_tests()}].
   33: 
   34: suite() ->
   35:     escalus:suite().
   36: 
   37: %%%===================================================================
   38: %%% Init & teardown
   39: %%%===================================================================
   40: 
   41: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   42:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_suite(Config0),
   43:     escalus:create_users(Config1, {by_name, [alice, bob]}).
   44: 
   45: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   46:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}),
   47:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   48: 
   49: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   50:     Config.
   51: 
   52: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   53:     ok.
   54: 
   55: init_per_testcase(max_offline_messages_reached, Config) ->
   56:     OldSettings = set_max_offline_messages([{5000,admin},
   57:                                             {?MAX_OFFLINE_MSGS,all}]),
   58:     escalus:init_per_testcase(max_offline_messages_reached,
   59:                              [{max_offline, OldSettings} | Config]);
   60: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   61:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   62: 
   63: end_per_testcase(max_offline_messages_reached, Config) ->
   64:     OldSettings = ?config(max_offline, Config),
   65:     set_max_offline_messages(OldSettings),
   66:     escalus:end_per_testcase(max_offline_messages_reached, Config);
   67: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   68:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   69: 
   70: %%%===================================================================
   71: %%% offline tests
   72: %%%===================================================================
   73: 
   74: simple_message(Config) ->
   75:     %% Alice sends a message to Bob, who is offline
   76:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
   77:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(bob, <<"Hi, Offline!">>))
   78:     end),
   79: 
   80:     %% Bob logs in
   81:     Bob = login_send_presence(Config, bob),
   82: 
   83:     %% He receives his initial presence and the message
   84:     Stanzas = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
   85:     escalus_new_assert:mix_match([is_presence,
   86:                                   is_chat(<<"Hi, Offline!">>)],
   87:                                  Stanzas),
   88:     escalus_cleaner:clean(Config).
   89: 
   90: error_message(Config) ->
   91:     not_stored_message(<<"error">>, Config).
   92: 
   93: groupchat_message(Config) ->
   94:     not_stored_message(<<"groupchat">>, Config).
   95: 
   96: headline_message(Config) ->
   97:     not_stored_message(<<"headline">>, Config).
   98: 
   99: not_stored_message(Type, Config) ->
  100:     %% Alice sends a message to Bob, who is offline
  101:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  102:         AliceJid = escalus_client:full_jid(Alice),
  103:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:message(AliceJid, bob, Type, <<"Hi, Offline!">>))
  104:     end),
  105: 
  106:     %% Bob logs in
  107:     Bob = login_send_presence(Config, bob),
  108: 
  109:     %% He receives his initial presence and no message
  110:     Presence = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  111:     escalus:assert(is_presence, Presence),
  112: 
  113:     ct:sleep(500),
  114: 
  115:     false = escalus_client:has_stanzas(Bob),
  116: 
  117:     escalus_cleaner:clean(Config).
  118: 
  119: max_offline_messages_reached(Config) ->
  120:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  121:         [send_message(Alice, I) || I <- lists:seq(1,?MAX_OFFLINE_MSGS+1)],
  122:         Packet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  123:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"wait">>, <<"resource-constraint">>], Packet),
  124:         ct:sleep(100),
  125:         false = escalus_client:has_stanzas(Alice)
  126: 
  127:     end),
  128: 
  129:     Bob = login_send_presence(Config, bob),
  130: 
  131:     %% He receives his initial presence and only 5 message
  132:     Stanzas = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, ?MAX_OFFLINE_MSGS+1),
  133: 
  134:     Preds = [is_chat(make_chat_text(I)) || I <- lists:seq(1, ?MAX_OFFLINE_MSGS)],
  135: 
  136:     escalus_new_assert:mix_match([is_presence | Preds], Stanzas),
  137: 
  138:     ct:sleep(500),
  139: 
  140:     false = escalus_client:has_stanzas(Bob),
  141: 
  142:     escalus_cleaner:clean(Config).
  143: 
  144: message_expiry(Config) ->
  145:     %% Alice sends a message to Bob, who is offline
  146:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  147:         LongExpiry = make_message_with_expiry(600),
  148:         ShortExpiry = make_message_with_expiry(1),
  149:         escalus:send(Alice, LongExpiry),
  150:         escalus:send(Alice, ShortExpiry)
  151:     end),
  152: 
  153:     ct:sleep(timer:seconds(2)),
  154:     %% Bob logs in
  155:     Bob = login_send_presence(Config, bob),
  156: 
  157:     %% He receives his initial presence and the message
  158:     Stanzas = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
  159:     escalus_new_assert:mix_match([is_presence,
  160:                                   is_chat(<<"Hi, Offline!">>)],
  161:                                  Stanzas),
  162: 
  163:     ct:sleep(500),
  164:     false = escalus_client:has_stanzas(Bob),
  165: 
  166:     escalus_cleaner:clean(Config).
  167: 
  168: 
  169: 
  170: %%%===================================================================
  171: %%% Custom predicates
  172: %%%===================================================================
  173: 
  174: is_chat(Content) ->
  175:     fun(Stanza) -> escalus_pred:is_chat_message(Content, Stanza) end.
  176: 
  177: %%%===================================================================
  178: %%% Helpers
  179: %%%===================================================================
  180: 
  181: login_send_presence(Config, User) ->
  182:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, User),
  183:     {ok, Client} = escalus_client:start(Config, Spec, <<"dummy">>),
  184:     escalus:send(Client, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  185:     Client.
  186: 
  187: set_max_offline_messages(Settings) ->
  188:     OptionName = {access,max_user_offline_messages, global},
  189:     Old = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, get_global_option, [OptionName]),
  190:     {atomic, ok} = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, add_global_option, [OptionName, Settings]),
  191:     Old.
  192: 
  193: send_message(Alice, I) ->
  194:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(bob, make_chat_text(I))),
  195:     timer:sleep(100).
  196: 
  197: 
  198: make_chat_text(I) ->
  199:     Number = integer_to_binary(I),
  200:     <<"Hi, Offline ", Number/binary>>.
  201: 
  202: make_message_with_expiry(Expiry) ->
  203:     ExpiryBin = list_to_binary(integer_to_list(Expiry)),
  204:     Stanza = escalus_stanza:chat_to(bob, <<"Hi, Offline!">>),
  205:     #xmlel{children = Children} = Stanza,
  206:     ExpiryElem = #xmlel{name = <<"x">>,
  207:                         attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"jabber:x:expire">>},
  208:                                  {<<"seconds">>, ExpiryBin}]},
  209:     Stanza#xmlel{children = [ExpiryElem | Children]}.
  210:
